metadata.title: CVE-2023-52807 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:hns3: fix out-of-bounds access may occur when coalesce info is read viadebugfs The hns3 driver define an array of string to show the coalesceinfo, but if the kernel adds a new mode or a new state, out-of-boundsaccess may occur when coalesce info is read via debugfs, this patch fix theproblem.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
